aircraft.value: Minotaur Heavy - AC-9448-961 at Base Echo

defect_observed.value: Tail assembly rivet loosening. Issue identified during pre-flight checks.

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Tail Assembly component. Testing confirmed performance below acceptable limits.

corrective_action.value: Revise maintenance procedure to include additional verification steps

preventive_action.value: Update technical documentation with lessons learned

remarks_investigation.value: Thorough investigation completed. Preventive actions recommended.

remarks_design.value: Design assessment confirms component operated within specified limits. Recommend enhanced inspection protocol. Date: 04/07/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Dr. P.L. Mehta

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality control procedures verified. Recommend periodic surveillance of manufacturing facility. Date: 06/07/2023 Signature: Sqn Ldr V.K. Patel

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Operational usage reviewed. Component operated within prescribed limits. Concur with investigation outcome. Date: 06/07/2023 Signature: Gp Capt V.S. Pillai

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality oversight review completed. Recommend monitoring effectiveness of implemented preventive actions. Date: 10/07/2023 Signature: Sqn Ldr V.K. Patel

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Airworthiness implications assessed. Recommend issuance of technical directive for fleet-wide compliance. Date: 14/07/2023 Signature: Dr. A.K. Sharma

Part - III: (Defect Details)

a) Root Cause Analysis: Age-related degradation of elastomeric components
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Tail Assembly component. Testing
confirmed performance below acceptable limits.

ii. Preventive Action: Update technical documentation with lessons learned
